data.actual_result: The application resizes itself and no longer is maximized.

data.short_description: resize cursor usable at the bottom of window when maximized
data.steps_to_repro: - Maximize the window. - Put mouse on the bottom of the window near the taskbar. - Drag the resize cursor up.
